-- 1.hcl --
schema "$db" {}

table "users" {
  schema = schema.$db
  column "text" {
    null = false
    type = text
  }
  index "users_text" {
    type = FULLTEXT
    columns = [column.text]
  }
}

-- 1.sql --
CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `text` text NOT NULL,
  FULLTEXT KEY `users_text` (`text`)
)

-- 2.hcl --

  schema = schema.$db

    null = false
    type = text
  }
}

-- 2.sql --
CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `text` text NOT NULL
)
